  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130073</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130073</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje v prostoru</string>
            <string language="en">Movement in space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung im Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement dans l'espace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento no espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento nello spazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση στο διάστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento en espacio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Razstavljanje gibanja v prostoru na tri sočasna gibanja vzporedna z koordinatnimi osmi.</string>
            <string language="en">Description on in-space motion as a superposition of three simpler motions parallel to coordinate axes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razstavljanje gibanja</string>
            <string language="en">motion decomposition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibanje v prostoru</string>
            <string language="en">motion in space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung auf Inplatz Bewegung als 
Superposition von drei einfacheren Bewegungen parallel zu den 
beigeordneten Äxten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description sur le mouvement du dans-espace comme
superposition de trois mouvements plus simples parallèles aux haches 
du même rang.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição no movimento do em-espaço como um 
superposition de três movimentos mais simples paralelos aos machados 
coordenados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione su movimento dello in-spazio come 
superposition di tre movimenti più semplici paralleli alle ascie 
coordinate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή στην-ΔΙΑΣΤΗΜΙΚΉ κίνηση ως superposition 
τριών απλούστερων κινήσεων παράλληλων στους ισότιμους άξονες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción en el movimiento del en-espacio como
superposición de tres movimientos más simples paralelos a las hachas
coordinadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung Aufspaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung im Platz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décomposition de mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement dans l'espace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">decomposition do movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento no espaço</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">decomposizione di movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento nello spazio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποσύνθεση κινήσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίνηση στο διάστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descomposición del movimiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento en espacio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
